name: Heterogeneous Feature-based Transfer Learning
description: Symmetric transformation  takes both the source feature space Xs and target feature space Xt and learns feature transformations as to project each onto a common subspace Xc for adaptation purposes. This derived subspace becomes a domain-invariant feature subspace to associate cross-domain data, and in effect, reduces marginal distribution differences.
x_kb_article:
## References
Wang, Q., Mao, K. Z., Wang, B., & Guan, J. (2017). Big data clustering by hybrid optimization algorithm. Journal of Big Data, 4(1), 25. [Link](https://journalofbigdata.springeropen.com/articles/10.1186/s40537-017-0089-0).
